income_certificate.aadhaar_card: [Requirement] Parse the following content from a scanned Aadhaar card document. The Aadhaar number is a 12-digit number with spaces in between. Extract the following data using the provided regex patterns, but do not include the regex patterns in the output: {'Name': {'Regex': '^[A-Za-z\s]+$', 'Explanation': 'Allows alphabets and spaces'} 'Aadhaar_number': {'Regex': '^[2-9]{1}[0-9]{3}\s[0-9]{4}\s[0-9]{4}$', 'Explanation': 'Valid Aadhaar format: 3675 9834 6012'} 'Date_of_birth': {'Regex': '^(0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01])[./-](0[1-9]|1[0-2])[./-](\d{4})$', 'Explanation': 'Valid date format: dd/mm/yyyy, dd-mm-yyyy, or dd.mm.yyyy'}} Explanation: - 'Name' field allows alphabets and spaces. - 'Aadhaar_number' field follows the specified Aadhaar format. - 'Date_of_birth' field follows valid date formats. [content]
income_certificate.application_form: [Requirement] Parse the following content from a scanned application form. Extract the following data using the provided regex patterns, but do not include the regex patterns in the output: {'Applicant Name': {'Regex': '^[A-Za-z\s]+$', 'Explanation': 'Allows alphabets and spaces'} 'Father_Husband_Name': {'Regex': '^[A-Za-z\s]+$', 'Explanation': 'Allows alphabets and spaces'} 'Date_of_birth': {'Regex': '^(0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01])[./-](0[1-9]|1[0-2])[./-](\d{4})$', 'Explanation': 'Valid date format: dd/mm/yyyy, dd-mm-yyyy, or dd.mm.yyyy'} 'Adhaar_Number': {'Regex': '^[2-9]{1}[0-9]{3}\s[0-9]{4}\s[0-9]{4}$', 'Explanation': 'Valid Aadhaar format: 3675 9834 6012'} 'Mobile_number': {'Regex': '^[0-9]{10}$', 'Explanation': 'Valid 10-digit mobile number'} 'Ration_card': {'Regex': '^[A-Za-z\s]+$', 'Explanation': 'Allows alphabets and spaces'}} Explanation: - 'Applicant Name' field allows alphabets and spaces. - 'Father/Husband Name' field allows alphabets and spaces. - 'Date_of_birth' field follows valid date formats. - 'Adhaar_Number' field follows the specified Aadhaar format. - 'Mobile_number' field follows the specified 10-digit mobile number format. - 'Ration_card' field allows alphabets and spaces. [content]

Extract the following data using the provided regex patterns, but do not include the regex patterns in the output: {'Applicant_Name': {'Regex': '^[A-Za-z\s]+$', 'Explanation': 'Allows alphabets and spaces'} 'Father_Husband_Name': {'Regex': '^[A-Za-z\s]+$', 'Explanation': 'Allows alphabets and spaces'} 'Date_Of_Birth': {'Regex': '^(0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01])[./-](0[1-9]|1[0-2])[./-](\d{4})$', 'Explanation': 'Valid date format: dd/mm/yyyy, dd-mm-yyyy, or dd.mm.yyyy'} 'Mobile_Number': {'Regex': '^\d{13}$', 'Explanation': '13-digit number'} 'Caste': {'Regex': '^[A-Za-z\s]+$', 'Explanation': 'Allows alphabets and spaces'} 'Aadhar_Card_No': {'Regex': '^\d{4}\s\d{4}\s\d{4}$', 'Explanation': 'Valid format: 1234 5678 9012'} 'Annual_Income': {'Regex': '^\d+$', 'Explanation': 'Integer value'}} Explanation: - 'Applicant_Name' field allows alphabets and spaces. - 'Father_Husband_Name' field allows alphabets and spaces. - 'Date_Of_Birth' field follows valid date formats. - 'Mobile_Number' field is a 13-digit number. - 'Caste' field allows alphabets and spaces. - 'Aadhar_Card_No' field follows the specified Aadhaar format. - 'Annual_Income' field is an integer value. [content]
